item.name: 7 Ages
item.comment: I love this game. It is long and large so I can't say I will always want to play it.

item.name: Age of Conan: The Strategy Board Game
Apples to Apples
item.comment: More of an activity than a game, very fun.

item.name: Arne
item.comment: The pain! The pain! There is more decision making in Fluxx

item.name: Babylon 5 Component Game System: Core Sets
BANG!
item.comment: I have raised my rating of this since I developed a new strategy. I only shoot whoever suggested playing this regardless of roles. Sadly this has not influenced my chances of winning.

item.name: Battlecards: World Conflict – The Russian Front – Starter Set
item.comment: Thought this was Battlelines. Very disappointing.

item.name: Battleground
item.comment: Minis for the rest of us!

item.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
Blood on the Snow: The Battle of Suomussalmi
Boomtown
item.comment: I dislike screw someone of your choice games. This does not even guarentee the ablity to retaliate.

item.name: Catz, Ratz and Batz
item.comment: Great to play with kids.

item.name: Doom: The Boardgame
item.comment: Lot's of neat stuff. Not my thing. I will never play this again.

item.name: Europe Engulfed
item.comment: Only time considerations prevent this from being a 10

item.name: A Game of Thrones (first edition)
item.comment: This game is a variation of Diplomacy but not so dry or long. I like it!

item.name: A Game of Thrones: A Clash of Kings Expansion
The Great Pacific War
item.comment: I'll probably never get to play this.

item.name: The Great Space Race
item.comment: To many fiddly bits. Substandard components. The cards are REALLY crappy. Lots and lots of randomness. But a heck of a lot of fun.

item.name: Great War at Sea: 1904-1905, The Russo-Japanese War
Groo: The Game
item.comment: Not a great game, but lots of silly fun

item.name: Heroscape Master Set: Rise of the Valkyrie
item.comment: A bit simple for my taste. Great for playing with kids!

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Lord of the Rings: The Search
NATO: The Next War in Europe
Pass the Pigs
item.comment: good for kids

item.name: The Powerpuff Girls: Villains at Large Game
item.comment: I have never played this with an adult.

item.name: Rise and Decline of the Third Reich
Rome at War II: Fading Legions
Second World War at Sea: Bomb Alley
item.comment: I wish this game came packaged with opponets included.

item.name: Second World War at Sea: SOPAC
The Settlers of the Stone Age
SPANC: Space Pirate Amazon Ninja Catgirls
item.comment: Great theme. Cool art. Uninspired but functional gameplay. This doesn't completely suck like most Steve Jackson games.

item.name: Star Wars: Jedi Unleashed
item.comment: I got this for the components. It was $3.00.

item.name: Tigris & Euphrates
item.comment: CLASSIC!

item.name: Twilight Imperium
item.conditiontext: Good. Includes Borderlands and Outer Rim expansions

item.name: Vampire Hunter
item.comment: To simple! But my 7 year old loves it and it was only 3 dollars.

item.name: War of the Ring: Battles of the Third Age
When Darkness Comes: The Most Dangerous Game
